data.title: EU Directive 2012-34 English
data.meta_description:
EU Directive 2012-34 English - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is a directive from the European Parliament and Council establishing a single European railway area. Some key points:

- It recasts three previous directives on developing the EU's railways, licensing railway undertakings, and allocating railway infrastructure capacity in order to render railway transport more efficient and competitive. 

- Infrastructure managers and transport service providers should be managed separately with separate accounts, though infrastructure managers can outsource administrative tasks. 

- Member States should ensure railway undertakings have independent commercial status and adapt to market needs, while retaining responsibility for infrastructure development. 

- Rules are needed for allocating infrastructure costs among railway undertakings in a non-discriminatory manner.
